item.title: Leiyue Yao
item.description: Research Interests Human Action Recognition Computer Vision Big Data Mining What’s Up I like programming. The main research worksï¼š Put forward a multi-features representation for human actions and a skeleton-based multi-scale deep neural network for human action recognition. The contributions of this work are three-fold: 1) Proposed a universal information dimensionality reduction method for transforming human action video to motion image or motion matrix. By using this method, the motion trajectory spatio-temporal overlaps problem can be effectively solved.
